member.summary: Occurs when a timeline marker is encountered during media playback.

member.summary: Occurs when there is an error associated with the MediaSource of the current .

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.BufferingTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time to buffer. The default is 5 seconds.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsFullScreen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the player is running maximized.
member.remarks: When full screen is abandoned this property resets to false automatically. Itâ€™s possible for the application to be maximized and this property to be false, for example an application containing several media players can only maximize one at a time.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.AutoPlay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether media begins to play automatically when the player starts or the current media item changes.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.NaturalDuration
member.summary: Gets the natural duration of the current media item.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.BufferingProgress
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the percentage of buffering progress made.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.DownloadProgress
member.summary: Gets a percentage value indicating the amount of download completed for content located on a remote server.
member.remarks: The value ranges from 0 to 1. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsChapterListVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the list of chapters for the current media item is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsItemListVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the list of media items is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsMuted
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the audio is muted.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsPlaying
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether media advances.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the current position of the current media item.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.Volume
member.summary: Gets or sets the media's volume.
member.remarks: The media's volume represented on a linear scale between 0 and 1. The default is 1.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsLooping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first media item should play after the last finishes.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsIdle
member.summary: Private property for the Idle state group.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.ToolBarExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for an optional extension of the ToolBar that contains the show/hide items/chapter list.
member.remarks: Allows adding more buttons or other content next to the chapter and items buttons. This is a Template because separate instances are needed for fullscreen and normal mode. Use ToolBarButtonBaseStyle as the style of buttons placed here to match the style of the template.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.ToolBarButtonBaseStyle
member.summary: Gets the style of the ToolBat buttons, so that the theme can be matched by user controls in the ToolBarExtension template.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.ScreenExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for an optional overlay of the video area.
member.remarks: This is a Template because separate instances are needed for fullscreen and normal mode.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsItemListButtonVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button that toggles the visibility of list of media items is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsChapterListButtonVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button that toggles the visibility of list of chapter items is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.UnstartedTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for an overlay over the screen when the state is Unstarted.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.BufferingTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for an overlay over the screen when the state is Buffering.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.PausedTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template for an overlay over the screen when the state is Paused.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsStopButtonVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button that stops the media is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsNextButtonVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button that advances to the next media item is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsPreviousButtonVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button that advances to the previous media item is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsFullScreenButtonVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button that toggles full screen mode is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsVolumeControlVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control that controls the media's volume is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsLoopButtonVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button that toggles media item list looping is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsPositionSliderVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the slider that shows and controls the current position is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsTimePresenterVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the widget that shows the current and total time of the media is visible.

member.summary: The current playing state of the video or audio file.

member.summary: Event raised when the property has changed.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text block that shows the title of the current item is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.IsPlayButtonVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button that starts and stops media playing is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.SuperimposeButtonsWindowed
member.summary: Set to true to show the buttons over the video when the player is not in full screen mode.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.SuperimposeButtonsFullScreen
member.summary: Set to true to show the buttons over the video when the player is in full screen mode.

member.summary: Gets or sets a graphics transformation that should apply to the media rectangle when layout is performed.

member.name: P:C1.Silverlight.MediaPlayer.C1MediaPlayer.AutoAdvance
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the player advances to the next media item when the reproduction of the current item ends. See also .

member.summary: Converts Boolean values to [0..1] opacity double values. true becomes 0.0 and false becomes 1.0.
